scripts.seed:sequelize: cp .env.sequelize .env; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.seed:sequelize:big: cp .env.sequelize .env; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all; npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --seeders-path ./src/database/seeders/sequelizeBigDataset
scripts.test:sequelize: echo '==========Testing sequelize==========' && cp .env.sequelize .env && npm install && NODE_ENV=production node ./src/backend.js & sleep 5 && echo 'Running tc collection' && tc --col KrakowEatsTestsForBigSeeder --report csv,html --stop-on-fail && echo 'Killing node server' && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/shutdown && sleep 2
scripts.test:mongo-local: echo '==========Testing mongo-local==========' && cp .env.mongo.local .env && npm install && NODE_ENV=production node ./src/backend.js & sleep 5 && echo 'Running tc collection' && tc --col KrakowEatsTestsForBigSeeder --report csv,html --stop-on-fail && echo 'Killing node server' && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/shutdown && sleep 2
scripts.test:mongo-atlas: echo '==========Testing mongo-atlas==========' && cp .env.mongo.atlas .env && npm install && NODE_ENV=production node ./src/backend.js & sleep 5 && echo 'Running tc collection' && tc --col KrakowEatsTestsForBigSeeder --report csv,html --stop-on-fail && echo 'Killing node server' && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/shutdown && sleep 2
scripts.test:all:refresh: rm -rf performanceMeasurements/logs/ performanceMeasurements/aggregatedPerformance.txt && npm run seed:sequelize:big && npm run test:sequelize && npm run seed:mongo-local:big && npm run test:mongo-local && npm run seed:mongo-atlas:big && npm run test:mongo-atlas && npm run test:computePerformance
